mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: McCook, George W. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: McCook, George W.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Sept 17 1862. By Telegraph from Steubenville 1862. Will leave Mingo at seven 7 oclock tomorrow morning how soon can you have coaches to take us on seven hundred & fifty 750 Geo W McCook 22 w49Coll
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: McCook, George W.
Steubenville, Ohio
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
